name: Moth Ma'am Prototype
description:
A prototype for a larger game.

The adorable Moth Ma'am has to put a stop to Popa Kap.

Abilities

- Flap: tap for a quick jump or mash to go higher

- Piercing Eyes: shoot eye lasers

- Drill: corkscrew as you airdash after a jump

Power Up

- bust open chests of health
